snippet.title: Lightyear Frontier - Wholesome Snack: The Game Awards Edition Trailer
snippet.description:
Lock in coordinates, because your life on the Frontier is just around the corner! Lightyear Frontier will be releasing into Early Access in March 2024! Build, farm and explore with up to three friends on PC, Xbox Series S|X, and Xbox Game Pass! https://lightyearfrontier.com/

Thanks to Wholesome Games for including us in this amazing showcase! Follow us on our socials, Discord, or our website for information and updates on the development of Lightyear Frontier!

ALL GAMEPLAY AND ASSETS SHOWN ARE A WORK IN PROGRESS AND MAY NOT BE REFLECTED IN THE FINAL PRODUCT

Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/41agxVy
Find us on Xbox: https://bit.ly/3zXOxZ9

Lightyear Frontier on Socials:
Discord: https://bit.ly/40bxgqe
Twitter: https://bit.ly/3KGkqut
TikTok: https://bit.ly/41ro6Hc
Instagram: https://bit.ly/41rOBfn
